title: Drawing, "Altars, Elevation", ca. 1780–90
medium:
Pen and brown ink, gray wash, black chalk, streak of brown chalk
Support: white laid paper
markings: Stamps: Collector's mark in blue ink at lower left corner: MB (Mary Brandegee)
inscribed: Partially obliterated inscription in graphite at lower left: [....]/Bernini
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource
